item.title: This Royal Icing Recipe with Corn Syrup Will Take Your Baking to the Next Level!
item.description: IV. Conclusion Introduction to Royal Icing Royal icing is a type of icing made from sugar, meringue powder, and water or corn syrup. It is primarily used for decorating cakes and cookies, as it sets quickly and can be used to create intricate designs. Benefits of Using Corn Syrup Adding corn syrup to your royal icing recipe can help to make it more pliable and easier to use. The corn syrup also helps to keep the icing from becoming too hard after it sets, allowing it to remain soft and flexible.
